All Classes

Class Description
AnswerMsgWriter
This class contains all the methods useful to write an XML schema message which represents a response to a client from the server.
BlockMoveUp
This class implements the power which blocks opponent players to move up if the worker moves up in this turn.
Board
Board is the class representing the entire game board.
Board
This class represents a Santorini Board.
Box
This class represents dimensions of various component in the cli
BuildBeforeMove
This class implements the power to build both before and after moving if the worker does not move up.
BuildDomeEverywhere
This class implements the power which allows worker to build dome also if level is not 3.
BuildUnderfoot
This class implements the power which allows worker to build onto the same square where it is located.
CanMoveUp
This class implements the power which restricts the standard power to move up (if the boolean moveUp is set to false).
Cli
This class contains all methods to visualize on the command line interface the game flow.
ClientDisconnectionListener
This interface defines server's action to manage a client disconnection situation.
ClientHandler
This class manages a single client TCP socket connection.
Color
Color is the enum representing the workers' possible colors.
ColorCode
This class represents escape codes that can set style and color of the text
ControllerInterface
This interface defines the controller's method that view can call.
Down2Win
This class implements the power which allows the player to win also if his worker moves down 2 or more levels.
EchoClient
This class manages a TCP socket connection (client side).
EchoServer
This class manages a multi-client TCP socket connection (server side).
EndGameController  
EndRemoveNeighbour
This class implements the power which, at end of his turn, allows a worker to replace opponent's workers occupying lower neighbour squares with a block and remove them from the game.
Error
Error is the enum representing the error codes showing up when the player moves or builds.
Escapes
this class represents escape codes that allow control over the terminal interface
ExtraBuild
This class implements the power to build one additional block under some conditions.
ExtraMove
This class implements the power to move one more time under some conditions.
GameController
This class implements the GameScene Controller
God
God is the class representing the god's card with his name, description and power.
God
This class represents a Santorini God.
GodSelectionController
This Class is the controller for the god selection connection scene.
GodsFactory
This class is responsible for parsing the XML and creating the gods according to the rules in 'godConfig'
GodsGenerator
This class is responsible for parsing the XML and creating the gods according to the rules in 'godInfo'
Gui
This class implements the GUI with JavaFX
GuiManager
This class creates the primary Stage and starts the GUI
InputCli
This class contains utilities for asynchronous input from CLI.
InputValidator
This class contains utilities to validate user input entered through the interface through the interface.
loginConnectionController
This Class is the controller for the initial connection scene.
LoginUsernameController
This Class is the controller for the login scene.
LoginWaitController
This Class is the controller for the wait after login scene.
Main
This is the main class.
MatchController
MatchController implements the controller for the current match.
ModelMsgContainer
This class is used to write and keep changes to the model during a specific action.
MovePush
This class implements the power which allows worker to move into a square occupied by another worker if the next square in the same direction is unoccupied; the other worker is pushed into that free space.
MoveSwap
This class implements the power which allows worker to move into a square occupied by another worker and switch positions with him.
MsgInParser
This class is responsible for parsing the msgIn XML (client-side) and call View methods to start the request processing.
MsgSender
This class implements sending an XML message to a client through a socket connection.
NoWinPerimeter
This class implements the power which inhibits opponent players to win on perimeter.
Player
Player represents a player who is currently playing in the match.
Player
This class represents a Player.
PlayerController
PlayerController handles the players in the current match.
PlayerOrderSelectionController
This Class is the controller for the starting player selection scene.
Power
Power is the interface responsible for implementing the god's power.
PowerDecorator
PowerDecorator is an abstract class necessary as a basis for the decoration of gods' powers (it is a part of Decorator pattern).
RequestMsgWriter  
RequestParser
This class is responsible for parsing the msgIn XML and call VirtualView methods to start the request processing.
Square
Square represents a single cell of the entire game board.
Square
This class represents a single square (that makes up the board).
StandardPower
StandardPower represents the standard power that all gods have in common.
State  
ToDoMsgWriter
This class contains all the methods useful to write an XML schema message which represents an indication of what to do to a client from the server.
Unicode
This enum class contains the unicode symbol used in the cli
UpdateMsgWriter
This class contains all the methods useful to write an XML schema message which represents a update to all clients from the server after an accepted request from one of these clients.
View
This abstract class contains all the information of the game useful to the client to show it to the user, the methods to update it based on the responses of the server and the methods to show the saved information (this latter will then be extended by the actual interfaces).
ViewInterface
This interface defines the view's method that controller can call.
VirtualView
This class simulates the presence of a view on the server (it takes care of receiving the translations of the requests, addressing them to the controller, receiving responses from the latter and sending them back to the real view located on the client.
Worker
Worker represents a pawn that the player uses to play.
Worker
This class represents a Santorini worker.
XMLInputStream
This class contains the logic behind reading an XML from the Input Stream.
XMLOutputStream
This class contains the logic behind write an XML onto Output Stream.
